verses.verse: Thou <S%H859><s%> also, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> thee a tile, <S%H3843><s%> and lay <S%H5414><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> thee, and portray <S%H2710><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it the city, <S%H5892><s%> even <S%H853><s%> Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%>

And lay <S%H5414><s%> siege <S%H4692><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it, and build <S%H1129><s%> a fort <S%H1785><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it, and cast <S%H8210><s%> a mount <S%H5550><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it; set <S%H5414><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> also against <S%H5921><s%> it, and set <S%H7760><s%> battering rams <S%H3733><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it round about. <S%H5439><s%>

Moreover take <S%H3947><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> unto thee an iron <S%H1270><s%> pan, <S%H4227><s%> and set <S%H5414><s%> it for a wall <S%H7023><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%> between <S%H996><s%> thee and the city: <S%H5892><s%> and set <S%H3559><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> against <S%H413><s%> it, and it shall be <S%H1961><s%> besieged, <S%H4692><s%> and thou shalt lay siege <S%H6696><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it. This <S%H1931><s%> shall be a sign <S%H226><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Lie <S%H7901><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> also upon <S%H5921><s%> thy left <S%H8042><s%> side, <S%H6654><s%> and lay <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it: according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the days <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou shalt lie <S%H7901><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it thou shalt bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

For I <S%H589><s%> have laid <S%H5414><s%> upon thee <S%H853><s%> the years <S%H8141><s%> of their iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the days, <S%H3117><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ninety <S%H8673><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%> so shalt thou bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And when thou hast accomplished <S%H3615><s%> <S%H853><s%> them, <S%H428><s%> lie <S%H7901><s%> again <S%H8145><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> thy right <S%H3233><s%> side, <S%H6654><s%> and thou shalt bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%> I have appointed <S%H5414><s%> thee each day for a year. <S%H3117><s%> <S%H8141><s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H8141><s%>

Therefore thou shalt set <S%H3559><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the siege <S%H4692><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and thine arm <S%H2220><s%> shall be uncovered, <S%H2834><s%> and thou shalt prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it.

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will lay <S%H5414><s%> bands <S%H5688><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee, and thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> turn <S%H2015><s%> thee from one side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6654><s%> to <S%H413><s%> another, <S%H6654><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> thou hast ended <S%H3615><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy siege. <S%H4692><s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> also unto thee wheat, <S%H2406><s%> and barley, <S%H8184><s%> and beans, <S%H6321><s%> and lentils, <S%H5742><s%> and millet, <S%H1764><s%> and fitches, <S%H3698><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> them in one <S%H259><s%> vessel, <S%H3627><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> thee bread <S%H3899><s%> thereof, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the days <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> shalt lie <S%H7901><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thy side, <S%H6654><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ninety <S%H8673><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shalt thou eat <S%H398><s%> thereof.

And thy meat <S%H3978><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> shall be by weight, <S%H4946><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> a day: <S%H3117><s%> from time <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6256><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> shalt thou eat <S%H398><s%> it.

Thou shalt drink <S%H8354><s%> also water <S%H4325><s%> by measure, <S%H4884><s%> the sixth part <S%H8345><s%> of a hin: <S%H1969><s%> from time <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6256><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> shalt thou drink. <S%H8354><s%>

And thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> it as barley <S%H8184><s%> cakes, <S%H5692><s%> and thou shalt bake <S%H5746><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> with dung <S%H1561><s%> that cometh out <S%H6627><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> in their sight. <S%H5869><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Even thus <S%H3602><s%> shall the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> their defiled <S%H2931><s%> <S%H853><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> among the Gentiles, <S%H1471><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I will drive <S%H5080><s%> them.

Then said <S%H559><s%> I, Ah <S%H162><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD! <S%H3069><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> been polluted: <S%H2930><s%> for from my youth <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5271><s%> up even till <S%H5704><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> have I not <S%H3808><s%> eaten <S%H398><s%> of that which dieth of itself, <S%H5038><s%> or is torn in pieces; <S%H2966><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> came <S%H935><s%> there abominable <S%H6292><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> into my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Lo, <S%H7200><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H853><s%> cow's <S%H1241><s%> dung <S%H6832><s%> for <S%H8478><s%> man's <S%H120><s%> dung, <S%H1561><s%> and thou shalt prepare <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy bread <S%H3899><s%> therewith. <S%H5921><s%>

Moreover he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will break <S%H7665><s%> the staff <S%H4294><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> in Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> and they shall eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> by weight, <S%H4948><s%> and with care; <S%H1674><s%> and they shall drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> by measure, <S%H4884><s%> and with astonishment: <S%H8078><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> they may want <S%H2637><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and water, <S%H4325><s%> and be astonished <S%H8074><s%> one <S%H376><s%> with another, <S%H251><s%> and consume away <S%H4743><s%> for their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>
